name: Monster March
description:
The best and cutest auto-pilot RPG!
■ Intuitive auto combat & auto quest game!
■ No need to stay online al lthe time, just relax and let it run!
■ Unlimited stages that never get boring!
■ Collect all the legendary monsters from around the world!
■ Challenge players from across the world!
■ Worldwide ranking battle! Fight for the honor of your country!
■ Strength in unity! Intense guild battles waiting for you to join!
■ Compete with Facebook friends to see who's the best!
■ Monsters on the move! Cultivate your own dream team!
■ Challenge ancient behemoths and craft rare artifacts!
■ Cultivate Goddess Amaterasu to aid you in battle!
